allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Project Setup Complete - Axiom X Website

- Initialize Next.js 16 with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, App Router
- Add shadcn/ui components \(button, input, textarea, card, accordion, sheet, form, skeleton\)
- Install dependencies: Framer Motion, Embla Carousel, React Hook Form, Zod, TanStack Query, Sonner, Lucide
- Configure Axiom X design system \(colors, fonts, CSS variables\)
- Create data files for services, stats, navigation, hero slides, brand values, partners
- Setup validation schemas and utility hooks
- Migrate assets from Old AxiomX \(logos, backgrounds, icons, videos\)
- Create PROGRESS-TRACKER.md for comprehensive task tracking
- Add documentation files for development guide

Tech Stack:
- Next.js 16 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS 4 + shadcn/ui
- Framer Motion \(animations\)
- Embla Carousel \(hero\)
- React Hook Form + Zod \(forms\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
